column4: sorry to say you came in at an in-opportune time, some of the ppl that could best help you are not on right now
no, hang out a while, ask again in 5 or so
what type of laptop is it?
I hadn't used ubuntu in about 5 months and decided to get back on it yesterday and had a bunch of updates to download/install which I did. Then after reboot everything went tits up heh
ahhh, so you updated a dormant install?
have you considered a fresh install of 8.04?
have you considered a fresh install of 8.04?
I had a fresh install of Hardy, I didn't upgrade from Gutsy at all
just saying, it lay dormant thru a lot of change
yeah, but I did the updates :)
and i didnt mean from gutsy, i meant from 5 months ago
oh ok. I just think whatever kernel update that went on during my off season wrecked it heh
also, make sure you have the latest bios update for that from HP,,, trust me
